Record.Question: CTRL+1
Record.Answer: Displays the Format Cells dialog box.

Record.Question: CTRL+2
Record.Answer: Applies or removes bold formatting.

Record.Question: CTRL+3
Record.Answer: Applies or removes italic formatting.

Record.Question: CTRL+4
Record.Answer: Applies or removes underlining.

Record.Question: CTRL+5
Record.Answer: Applies or removes strikethrough.

Record.Question: CTRL+6
Record.Answer: Alternates between hiding and displaying objects.

Record.Question: CTRL+8
Record.Answer: Displays or hides the outline symbols.

Record.Question: CTRL+9
Record.Answer: Hides the selected rows.

Record.Question: CTRL+0
Record.Answer: Hides the selected columns.

Record.Question: CTRL+A
Record.Answer: Selects the entire worksheet.

Record.Question: CTRL+B
Record.Answer: Applies or removes bold formatting.

Record.Question: CTRL+C
Record.Answer: Copies the selected cells.

Record.Question: CTRL+D
Record.Answer: Uses the Fill Down command to copy the contents and format of the topmost cell of a selected range into the cells below.

Record.Question: CTRL+F
Record.Answer: Displays the Find and Replace dialog box, with the Find tab selected.

Record.Question: SHIFT+F4
Record.Answer: Repeats the last Find action.

Record.Question: SHIFT+F5
Record.Answer: Displays the Find and Replace dialog box

Record.Question: CTRL+SHIFT+F
Record.Answer: Opens the Format Cells dialog box with the Font tab selected.

Record.Question: CTRL+G
Record.Answer: Displays the Go To dialog box.

Record.Question: F5
Record.Answer: Displays the Go To dialog box.

Record.Question: CTRL+H
Record.Answer: Displays the Find and Replace dialog box, with the Replace tab selected.

Record.Question: CTRL+I
Record.Answer: Applies or removes italic formatting.

Record.Question: CTRL+K
Record.Answer: Displays the Insert Hyperlink dialog box for new hyperlinks or the Edit Hyperlink dialog box for selected existing hyperlinks.

Record.Question: CTRL+L
Record.Answer: Displays the Create Table dialog box.

Record.Question: CTRL+N
Record.Answer: Creates a new, blank workbook.

Record.Question: CTRL+O
Record.Answer: Displays the Open dialog box to open or find a file.

Record.Question: CTRL+SHIFT+O
Record.Answer: Selects all cells that contain comments.

Record.Question: CTRL+P
Record.Answer: Displays the Print tab in Microsoft Office Backstage view.

Record.Question: CTRL+SHIFT+P
Record.Answer: Opens the Format Cells dialog box with the Font tab selected.

Record.Question: CTRL+R
Record.Answer: Uses the Fill Right command to copy the contents and format of the leftmost cell of a selected range into the cells to the right.

Record.Question: CTRL+S
Record.Answer: Saves the active file with its current file name, location, and file format.

Record.Question: CTRL+T
Record.Answer: Displays the Create Table dialog box.

Record.Question: CTRL+U
Record.Answer: Applies or removes underlining.

Record.Question: CTRL+SHIFT+U
Record.Answer: Switches between expanding and collapsing of the formula bar.

Record.Question: CTRL+V
Record.Answer: Inserts the contents of the Clipboard at the insertion point and replaces any selection. Available only after you have cut or copied an object, text, or cell contents.

Record.Question: CTRL+ALT+V
Record.Answer: Displays the Paste Special dialog box. Available only after you have cut or copied an object, text, or cell contents on a worksheet or in another program.

Record.Question: CTRL+W
Record.Answer: Closes the selected workbook window.

Record.Question: CTRL+X
Record.Answer: Cuts the selected cells.

Record.Question: CTRL+Y
Record.Answer: Repeats the last command or action, if possible.

Record.Question: CTRL+Z
Record.Answer: Uses the Undo command to reverse the last command or to delete the last entry that you typed.

Record.Question: CTRL+SHIFT+(
Record.Answer: Unhides any hidden rows within the selection.

Record.Question: CTRL+SHIFT+ &
Record.Answer: Applies the outline border to the selected cells.

Record.Question: CTRL+SHIFT+_
Record.Answer: Removes the outline border from the selected cells.

Record.Question: CTRL+SHIFT+~
Record.Answer: Applies the General number format.

Record.Question: CTRL+SHIFT+$
Record.Answer: Applies the Currency format with two decimal places (negative numbers in parentheses).

Record.Question: CTRL+SHIFT+%
Record.Answer: Applies the Percentage format with no decimal places.

Record.Question: CTRL+SHIFT+^
Record.Answer: Applies the Scientific number format with two decimal places.

Record.Question: CTRL+SHIFT+#
Record.Answer: Applies the Date format with the day, month, and year.

Record.Question: CTRL+SHIFT+@
Record.Answer: Applies the Time format with the hour and minute, and AM or PM.

Record.Question: CTRL+SHIFT+!
Record.Answer: Applies the Number format with two decimal places, thousands separator, and minus sign (-) for negative values.

Record.Question: CTRL+SHIFT+*
Record.Answer: Selects the current region around the active cell (the data area enclosed by blank rows and blank columns).

Record.Question: CTRL+SHIFT+:
Record.Answer: Enters the current time.

Record.Question: CTRL+SHIFT+"
Record.Answer: Copies the value from the cell above the active cell into the cell or the Formula Bar.

Record.Question: CTRL+SHIFT+Plus (+)
Record.Answer: Displays the Insert dialog box to insert blank cells.

Record.Question: CTRL+Minus (-)
Record.Answer: Displays the Delete dialog box to delete the selected cells.

Record.Question: CTRL+;
Record.Answer: Enters the current date.

Record.Question: CTRL+`
Record.Answer: Alternates between displaying cell values and displaying formulas in the worksheet.

Record.Question: CTRL+'
Record.Answer: Copies a formula from the cell above the active cell into the cell or the Formula Bar.
